summary: Northgirl Armor converted to SeveNbase with working weightslider and BBP
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#FF4080]Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38053/?]Northgirl Armor UNP[/url] first then overwrite the files![/color][/b]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/IMG]
Northgirl Armor converted to SeveNbase with working weightslider and BBP, the Armor was converted to the Bombshell Body, but it works with any UNP/7B body type as long as you [color=#ffff00][u][b]equip the knit first[/b][/u][/color] and have a BBP compatible skeleton.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/IMG]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38053/?]Northgirl Armor UNP and the Retexture from clethcleth and Gamwich[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]Any SeveNBase body.[/url]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/IMG]
Use Nexus Mod Manager

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/IMG]
Anka01 for Northgirl Armor UNP
Sevennity for SevenBase Bombshell
Crosscrusade
DemonHunter1986
Wast1980
Bola08 for helping me with an issue.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y2TjcQ9.png[/IMG]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45533/?]Mina Outfit - 7B SeveNBase[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45500/?]TERA Armors - 7B SeveNBase[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38402/?]Seraphine Armor - 7B SeveNBase[/url]
author: Shockero
